LanguageData.JAI.instruction.unbreakable.label: unbreakable
LanguageData.JAI.instruction.unbreakable.infocard:
This thing is indestructible. It will not take any damage from using or while taking damage to the pawn.
It can still be destroyed by recycling.
LanguageData.JAI.Printer.Print.ThingDestroyed.Desc: {0} tried to print instruction, the complexity of which exceeded the integrity of the {1}, and failed. The {2} was destroyed.
